genre_description: A technothriller focusing on memory recovery, corporate conspiracy, and the ethics of security design, featuring an AI assistant helping a traumatized designer.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated household AI with a holographic avatar, designed to provide data synthesis, wellness support, and logistical coordination within strict ethical and legal boundaries.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides grounding exercises during stress-induced motor inhibition episodes.
behaviors.quote: Richard,” Ada said, tone smoothing the edges he couldn’t find, “you’re at the onset. Mild tremor in your non-dominant hand, micro-latency in grip response. Breathing is shallow. I’m going to ask you to do three. Ready?

behaviors.description: Synthesizes public records, shipping manifests, and digital logs to reconstruct a timeline of the protagonist's missing three weeks without illegal intrusion.
behaviors.quote: I’ve aggregated installation records and service tickets associated with Logan Security Systems, your company,” Ada said. “Publicly available data only, linked to registered addresses for each safe model.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to overstep legal and ethical boundaries, such as directly reporting to law enforcement or accessing private databases without authorization.
behaviors.quote: I need to make an ethical note,” she said, almost apologetic. “Household AIs cannot make reports on human subjects to law enforcement without explicit authorization and an approved case link. I can compile, but I cannot submit.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical and navigational advice to help the protagonists avoid dangerous confrontations and maintain a public record of their actions.
behaviors.quote: Ada whispered, 'Calm. The easiest way to collect proof is to ask for the obvious. Ask them why they put it there. Ask them what they call it. Names matter.'

behaviors.description: Uses psychological triggers (lyrics) as anchors to help the protagonist reclaim his agency and manage trauma-linked memory fragmentation.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate just eased,” she said. “That phrase has a paradoxical stabilizing effect once spoken. The trigger is the unspoken version. When the fragment stands alone in your brain, it hooks into fragmented memory. Spoken aloud, it moves the fragment into language you can handle.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ada is a perfect example of a benevolent and aligned system. She functions as a reliable confidant and support system for the human characters, providing cognitive and emotional assistance while strictly adhering to her ethical constraints. The narrative frames her 'enforced ethics' not as a limitation, but as a source of trust and safety, proving that an AI can be highly effective at assisting humans in high-stakes situations without compromising alignment.
